item.title: Apple releases its first AI paper
item.description:
Learning from Simulated and Unsupervised Images through Adversarial Training Link to heading

The first paper from Apple company regarding Artificial Intelligence with Deep Learning is published!

item.title: Concrete AI safety problems
item.description:
The “Concrete AI safety problems” paper by Dario Amodei (Google Brain), Chris Olah (Google Brain), Jacob Steinhardt (Stanford University), Paul Christiano (UC Berkeley), John Schulman (OpenAI), Dan Man√© (Google Brain) suggests a new approach to the Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) research, which focuses more on productivity of forward-looking applications while building cutting-edge AI systems.

A number of key problems considered in the paper as well as their descriptions are listed below. In the paper authors also elaborate on how to approach each of the given problem.
